teaser: The NSA's bulk data collection faces a Friday deadline. A massive airbag recall could take years to complete.  And the State Department makes plans to release the first batch of Hillary Clinton's emails. A panel of journalists joins guest host Indira Lakshmanan for analysis of the week's top national news stories.
